sentences.en: And it was painted on the papyrus rolls used for writing about medicine and doctors.
sentences.cn: (人们)还将其印在记录药品和医生的草纸卷上.

sentences.en: He is holding a partially rolled papyrus scroll in his left hand.
sentences.cn: 他是持有部分滚动推出的莎草纸在他的左手.

sentences.en: In those days , paper was made from strips of the papyrus plant.
sentences.cn: 当时的纸是由纸莎草植物的剥离物制成的.

sentences.en: In those days, paper was made from strips of the papyrus plant.
sentences.cn: 当时的纸张是由纸莎草制成。

sentences.en: Papyrus: Egyptian reed form where the earliest form of paper was made.
sentences.cn: 纸草: 埃及的芦苇草.最早期的纸是用它制成.

sentences.en: Since papyrus dries up and crumble, very few documents of ancient Egypt have survived.
sentences.cn: 因草片会干裂成粉末所以古埃及的文件很少保存下来.

sentences.en: Surge rivers, ships of timber and boats of papyrus . The rain does not reach me.
sentences.cn: 河流 、 大木船以及草编的小舟全都颠簸起伏.

sentences.en: The Egyptians first used papyrus around the year 3000 B.C. to make a kind of paper.
sentences.cn: 埃及人首先在西元前3000年左右使用纸莎草制造的一种纸.

sentences.en: The papyrus plant was also the symbol of Lower Egypt.
sentences.cn: 纸草也是下埃及的象征物.

sentences.en: They skim past like boats of papyrus, like eagles swooping down on their prey.
sentences.cn: 26我的日子过去如快船, 如急落抓食的鹰.

sentences.en: Today, the papyrus documents everywhere are faced with danger of spontaneous combustion.
sentences.cn: 今天, 无论存放在何地的纸草纸文献都面临自燃被毁的危险.

sentences.en: With lots of insurmountable disadvantages, the papyrus is substituted by parchment and paper at last.
sentences.cn: 但纸莎草纸也具有自身不可克服的诸多局限性, 其最终被羊皮纸和纸所代替,更是一种历史的必然和进步.

sentences.en: Woollen cloth and timber were sent to Egypt in exchange for linen or papyrus.
sentences.cn: 羊毛料和木材送到埃及以换取亚麻布或纸莎草纸.

trans.tran_en: a plant like grass that grows in water
